Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Whoever \Who*ev"er\, pron. Whatever person; any person who; be or she who; any one who; as, he shall be punished, whoever he may be. ``Whoever envies or repines.'' --Milton. ``Whoever the king favors.'' --Shak. [1913 Webster]
